name: awssdk
description: AWS SDK Data Source App (DSA) for BoilingData
funcTemplate: async ({ AWS, region }) => { const _s = new AWS.{{service}}({ region }); return (await _s.{{apicall}}({{params}}).promise().catch(err => console.error(err))){{resultPath}}; }

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: AWS Service to use, like S3 or Lambda

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: What parameters to pass to the method call, like '{"Bucket":"boilingdata-demo","Delimiter":"/"}'

parameters.name: resultPath
parameters.description: What part to pick up from the AWS JSON resopnse (e.g. `.Contents`). The response must be an array of objects.

examples.description: Use AWS NodeJS SDK to all S3 Buckets

examples.sql: SELECT key, size FROM dsa.awssdk('S3','listObjectsV2','{"Bucket":"boilingdata-demo","Delimiter":"/"}','.Contents') WHERE key LIKE '%.parquet' ORDER BY key;
examples.description: Use AWS NodeJS SDK to list a bucket, with delimiter (folders)
Use AWS NodeJS SDK to call Lambda function
